items.name: Panner Lababdar
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and cashew nut paste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Do Pyaza
items.description: Succulent pieces of chicken are cooked to perfection in a rich and spicy gravy alongside a generous amount of caramelized onions. The onions play a dual role in this dish, they are sautéed to a golden brown, releasing their natural sweetness and imparting a distinct flavor to the dish. Additionally, some raw onions are added towards the end to provide a fresh and crunchy texture.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Poha
items.description: Maharashtrian style poha made from flattened rice stir-fried with a blend of spices, potato, peanuts, and garnished with lemon juice and grated coconut.

items.name: Matar Pulao
items.description: Rice cooked with whole spice, ghee, green peas and garnished with mint and corinader

items.name: Bendekai Kayirasa
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish that features okra as the star ingredient. It is a flavourful and aromatic curry made with tender okra cooked in a creamy coconut-based gravy. The dish is known for its tangy and mildly spicy taste, which is balanced perfectly with the rich and smooth texture of the coconut.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Cunpir Miri
items.description: A delicious and aromatic chicken dish that originates from the coastal region of Mangalore in Karnataka, India. It is known for its vibrant flavors derived from coriander leaves and black pepper.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Garlic Potato Bites
items.description: Delicious and flavorful snack made with bite-sized potato pieces infused with the aromatic flavors of garlic.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns.

items.name: Veg Makhanwala
items.description: Indian dish known for its rich and creamy tomato-based sauce. The vegetables are sautéed and then simmered in the tomato-based gravy, which is flavoured with spices like cumin, coriander, garam masala, and fenugreek leaves (kasuri methi). The addition of cream adds a smooth and velvety texture to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Murg Makhanwala
items.description: Murg Makhanwala, also known as Butter Chicken, is a popular and indulgent Indian dish that is loved for its rich and creamy tomato-based gravy. A culinary delight that features succulent pieces of chicken cooked in a velvety smooth gravy. The dish originates from the Punjab region of India.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Vada Pav Quesadilla
items.description: Mashed spiced potato stuffed in between whole wheat flatbread and smeered with dry garlic chutney and pan cooked. (2 pieces)

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Goan Mushroom Xacuti
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic dish hailing from the coastal state of Goa, India. It features mushrooms cooked in a vibrant and spicy masala, known as xacuti. Known for its complex and robust flavours. The spice blend, combined with the natural umami of the mushrooms, creates a delightful fusion of taste. Garnished with fresh coriander leaves for added freshness.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Fish Curry
items.description: Fish cooked with freshly made spice paste of onion, tamarind and red chillies. (Place your order by 3pm on Wed. to account for availability of fish)
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Chicken Rice
items.description: Chicken thigh grilled and cooked in a spicy gravy made with onion, tomato, ginger garlic and chillies, cooked together with rice and garnished with fresh coriander.

items.name: Veg Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice, chicken and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy by the side.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Mushroom Masala
items.description: Mushrooms are cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Tariwala Murg
items.description: Chicken thigh with drumsticks marinated with ginger-garlic paste and other spices cooked in flavourful gravy of onion and tomato. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Paneer Fingers
items.description: Paneer is cut into strips, marinated with spices and seasonings, coated with a batter and breadcrumbs, and then deep-fried or baked until golden and crispy. The result is a crispy and flavorful snack with a soft and creamy paneer interior.

items.name: Vagharela Bhaat
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish from the state of Gujarat in India.

items.name: Drumstick Curry in Coconut
items.description: South Indian dish prepared by cooking drumsticks (moringa pods) in a creamy and fragrant coconut milk-based gravy. The dish is seasoned with a blend of spices and includes onions, tomatoes, and curry leaves for added flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Kerala Chicken Stew
items.description: Dish from the South Indian state of Kerala. It is made with chicken pieces cooked in a rich coconut milk-based gravy along with vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and onions.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sindhi Koki
items.description: Whole wheat flour mixed with gram flour, onions, chillies, sesame seeds and other spices, pan cooked into a flatbread. Served with onion-tomato chutney. (2 koki)

items.name: Paneer Paratha
items.description: Indian cottage cheese mixed with different spices and chilles stuffed inside whole wheat flatbread and cooked on a pan. Served with achar + yogurt. (2 parathas)

items.name: Nadru Yakhni
items.description: A Kashmiri dish made with lotus stem (nadru) cooked in a creamy and aromatic yogurt-based gravy. The lotus stem is simmered in a flavorful combination of spices, ginger, fennel seeds, and bay leaves, along with a generous amount of yogurt, which lends a rich and creamy texture to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kashmiri Matar Te Kokur
items.description: A popular Kashmiri dish that combines green peas (matar) and chicken (kokur) in a rich and flavorful curry. The dish is prepared with a blend of aromatic spices such as fennel seeds, ginger, cinnamon, cardamom, and Kashmiri red chili powder, giving it a unique and fragrant taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mixed Vegetable & Dal Pakoda
items.description: An Indian fried snack made by combining a mixture of lentils (dal) and finely chopped mixed vegetables

items.name: Erissery
items.description: Vegetarian dish from the South Indian state of Kerala. It is made using a combination of vegetables, primarily pumpkin (mathanga), cooked in a coconut-based gravy. Served with rice.

items.name: Paneer Matar ki Tehri
items.description: Comforting rice dish from north India. It is prepared by cooking basmati rice with paneer (Indian cottage cheese), green peas (matar), and a variety of aromatic spices. Served with yogurt raita and achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A classic Indian rice dish that is layered with succulent lamb meat and aromatic spices. The meat is marinated in yogurt and spices, and cooked separately with fragrant rice, saffron, and fried onions. The two are then layered together and slow-cooked on low heat, allowing the flavors to blend together perfectly. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Crispy Chilli Chicken
items.description: An Indo-Chinese dish known for its crunchy texture and spicy flavor. Spicy and succulent chicken is cooked with a fiery blend of chili peppers and aromatic spices.

items.name: Bisi Bele Bhaat
items.description: A comforting meal with veggies, lentils, garlic and bisli masala topped with curry leaves and ghee.

items.name: Lagan nu Stew
items.description: A hearty and flavorful dish from the Gujarati-Parsi cuisine of India. It is a vegetarian stew made with a variety of vegetables and dal (lentils) cooked in a fragrant blend of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sali Boti
items.description: A Parsi dish from India, known for its rich and flavorful preparation. It consists of tender pieces of lamb, cooked in a thick and tangy tomato-based gravy. Topped off with crispy potato straws (sali), which adds a delightful crunch and texture to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Thepla
items.description: Gujarati flatbread that is flavorful, soft, and slightly crispy. It is made using a combination of whole wheat flour and spices. (4 thepla)

items.name: Rasam Rice
items.description: A comforting dish from the south of India. Toamto, tamarind, garlic, cumin cooked together with homemade rasam powder for a soupy consistency. Served with rice and papad.
